about_the_game:
Game Overview

Horizon’s Edge is an open-world survival game set in a world overrun by zombies. Up to 100 players compete for survival in a hostile environment filled with dangerous NPC enemies, zombies, and wildlife such as deer.

Setting and Environment

Explore a landscape with mountains, forests, small islands, military base and more! The dynamic environment includes changing weather and time of day, adding to the challenge of survival.

Survival Mechanics

One of your biggest enemies are hunger, thirst, and health. Manage these by finding food, water, and medical supplies. Gather resources, hunt animals for food and craft weapons, tools to protect yourself from zombies, NPC enemies, and other players.

Zombies, Npc Enemies, and Wildlife

Face off against various types of zombies, hostile non-playable characters (NPCs) that want to kill you, and hunt animals. NPCs are controlled by intelligent AI, making them unpredictable and dangerous.

Multiplayer Interaction

Form alliances or compete against other survivors in a game where you can't trust anyone. Every interaction with another player can be a potential danger or a good opportunity.

Strategy and Exploration

Develop strategies for survival, by forming alliances or going solo. Explore the open world to find resources, build structures, and secure a lead over other survivors.
